title: CLDF dataset derived from Lee and Hasegawa's "Evolution of the Ainu Language in Space and Time" from 2013
description:
Cite the source of the dataset as:

Lee Sean, Hasegawa Toshikazu (2013). Evolution of the Ainu Language in Space and Time. PLOS ONE 8(4): e62243. https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0062243
